title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Problem-Solving Discussion Class Design: Collaborative Thinking and Critical Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex social issues and generate discussion questions to derive core concepts at least three times during the 4-week course
Learners can provide at least two critical feedbacks per session on peers' arguments during discussions while maintaining keyword connectivity above 80%
Learners can synthesize solutions derived from discussions under teacher scaffolding and submit them as reports exceeding 1,000 characters
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
